titles.title: Commission on the Airplane Crash at Gander, Newfoundland, Act
A bill to establish a Commission on the airplane crash at Gander, Newfoundland.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 6/24/1993--Introduced. Commission on the Airplane Crash at Gander, Newfoundland, Act - Establishes in the legislative branch of the Government the Commission on the Airplane Crash at Gander, Newfoundland. Directs the Commission to investigate, study, and report to the President and the Congress on the circumstances surrounding the crash of an Arrow Airlines airplane near Gander, Newfoundland, Canada, on December 12, 1985.
